              ["Note: "],
              ["endIndex", [["c"]]],
              [" is after the end of the string (i.e. "],
              ["string[string.endIndex]", [["c"]]],
              [" is an error, but "],
              ["string[string.startIndex]", [["c"]]],
              [" is fine). Also, in an empty string ("],

              ["), "],
              ["string.startIndex == string.endIndex", [["c"]]],
              [" is "],
              ["true", [["c"]]],
